author: shari spackmam
comment: Super Cute watch face! I love it!
Absolutely love it!!! Crossing for my fingers for more background colors in the future :)

author: Avtar Rekhi
comment: Love the design, but would like a "second hand" on the square version

author: Noemie Coulombe
comment: Very cute! Love it with the black design

author: Nery GreenWolf
comment: Lovely designs

author: Jeanne Sutton
comment: Simple and fun. This watch face has been tempting me for awhile. Finally, downloaded and am in love. Holocene isn't my favorite as it looks wonky on my round watch which is too bad... So cute.  Skinny Love and For Emma look great!
title: Less is marvelous

author: Lo Mack
comment: Can you add different icons other then fox? This would be for the square face.
title: Add more icons

author: Vanessa M
comment: Watch interface issues fixed. Great communication from seller. Nice watch faces.
title: Great

author: kayla luther
comment: My all time fav!

author: angie reece
comment: i absolutely adore the watch faces!  took a minute before it would work on my lg watch urbane, but it works great now.  emailed the creator about a problem and he replied very fast. please create more!!

author: John-Paul M Jeffers
comment: The default Skinny Love watch face reminded me a lot of Life is Strange. Saw the face on the store and I had to have it! Works (and looks) wonderfully on my Moto 360!
title: Fell in love!

author: Renee Perkins
comment: I really like this face for my moto360 I had a couple bugs with getting the face to change but have since worked them out. Worth the .99¢
title: Cute and functional

author: Angie Hoyt
comment: Love love love this face.  The background is black in resting with white date, time, and day. Very suttle.  Then when you touch screen it has white background and very classy.  Great app, great functionality!!!
title: Moto 360 2nd Gen 5 STAR

author: Victoria DeMaso
comment: I paid for this on my andriod wear. It never showed up for me to use....

reply.author: Shameron Studios
reply.content:
Hi Victoria,

This is because Android Wear's synchronization process is unreliable. It can sometimes take up to an hour to sync. Here are some tips to improve the process: http://apps.shameronstudios.com/how-to-setup-an-android-wear-watch-face

Send me an email if you have any more questions.

Thank you,
Shameron Studios

author: Hillary Mcknight
comment: First generation moto 360...this face does not work with my watch.

reply.author: Shameron Studios
reply.content:
Hi Hillary,

Can you elaborate on what you mean by "does not work"?

Send me an email!

Thanks,
Cameron

title: Moto 360

author: Angela M.
comment: Perfect. Works and looks awesome on my Lg G watch.
title: Exactly what i was looking for

author: Brittany Read
comment: Pretty! Wish I could add color to it but so pretty!

author: Renee Alberty
comment: This is horrible. Title of my review says it all. I need a refund but do not see a refund option.  They need to fix the issues here. The number (actual time and date) do not show up on the Moto360 watch.

reply.author: Shameron Studios
reply.content:
Hi Renee,

Sorry to hear you're having problems. We've updated the watch to have better defaults so it will work when Android Wear's software is having trouble. Give it a shot and if it still isn't working, send me an email and I can try to refund your order.

Thank you!
Shameron Studios

title: This does not work on my brand new Moto360

author: Wallis Vrouwe
comment: The new "for Emma" option is adorable on my moto 360 v2.

author: Kim Miller
comment: I just upgraded to the Moto 360 2... This was my go to watch face on my first 360, but with the new resting pixles it looks poopy when the watch is in stand by. Other than that this, in the dark mode, was my all time favorite watch face!!
title: Aww... It WAS PERFECT!

author: Julie Bonk
comment: I bought and downloaded this for my Moto 360.  It's a bit of a bummer that 24 hour isn't an easy option and the typeface is light and hard to read from a distance.  All together, it's so whimsical, sweet and feminine. I'm really happy to see this kind of design on the store. I recommend it to anyone looking for a simple design to use out on a date or around the office. The ambient display mimics the black background design and looks great.
title: Whimsical & Minimal

author: Shane
comment: Have a Sony Smart Watch 3, doesn't seem to wasn't too install on it. I'll get the refund now and maybe but lawyer if I switch devices or something... :(

reply.author: Shameron Studios
reply.content:
Hi Shane,

This is a problem with the Android Wear platform. The only solution is to restart your watch and your phone to force synchronization.

I'm sorry this didn't work out for you, but please keep this in mind while using other watch faces as well.

Thank you!

title: Is this only for specific models?

author: David Wengert
comment: Can't put on my moto 360

reply.author: Shameron Studios
reply.content:
Hi David!

Sometimes Android Wear has trouble syncing new watch faces to your device. Please follow these instructions to see if it fixes the problem:

http://apps.shameronstudios.com/how-to-setup-an-android-wear-watch-face/

Thanks!
Cameron

author: Tina Emilia
comment: Simple, adorable! Has time, day, and date.
title: My favorite watch face!

author: Megan DeFrees
comment: Pretty!

author: Janan Sathiendran
comment: I'm giving it a three star rating cos the watch face looks lovely. One problem though - i've installed, and it hasn't appeared in the selection of watch faces for me to pick from on my watch (Moto 360). Also hasn't appeared in the Moto Connect app on my phone. So I can't actually apply the watch face... *EDIT* problem solved, guess it was a sync-ing issue, thanks. Watch face looks great.

reply.author: Shameron Studios
reply.content:
Hi Janan!

Sometimes Android Wear has trouble syncing new watch faces to your device. You must use the Android Wear app provided by Google to choose the watch faces. Please follow these instructions to see if it fixes the problem:

http://apps.shameronstudios.com/how-to-setup-an-android-wear-watch-face/

Thanks!
Cameron

title: Great

author: Kelby Christofferson
comment: Is there a way to make it 24hr?
title: How playful!

author: Thomas Tobin
comment: Great clean watch face

author: Tawnya Friesen
comment: It's super cute and i couldn't wait to use it but no matter what i tried i couldn't get it to let me use 12 hour time or a different style. Very frustrated.

reply.author: Shameron Studios
reply.content:
Hi Tawna,

Have you tried configuring the watch face from your phone? Please send me an email and I can see if I can fix the issue.

Thank you,
Shameron Studios

title: Glitches badly.

author: Jsn
comment: Paid my money and the app didn't show up on my phone

reply.author: Shameron Studios
reply.content:
Hi Jason,

Unfortunately, the Android Wear synchronization can take some time. Send me an email and I'll see if I can help.

Thanks,
Cameron
